name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On September 16, a user named "Shanghai Vaccine Parent Hua Xiuzhen" posted a help post, saying that her daughter Tan Hua is a master's degree holder from Fudan University and MIT, and was disabled after receiving a rabies vaccine in 2014. In 2018, she went to Beijing to petition because her petitions were not accepted many times, and her pension was subsequently cancelled.
On September 11, 2023, her daughter was arrested for going to Ningbo University to demand the return of her mother's pension and has been out of contact ever since.
Hope the outside world will pay attention

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Today is the first anniversary of the Guizhou quarantine bus incident

In the early morning of September 18, 2022, a bus for transport and quarantine in Qiannan Prefecture, Guizhou overturned, killing 27 people.

One year later, all of us are still on this bus.

Following the instructions of "a little funny but need to be obeyed", we drove towards the unknown.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the morning of September 18, a man was caught running naked on a busy street in Hushu South Road, Gongshu District, Hangzhou.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On September 18, Hangzhou did not sound the air raid sirens as in previous years, sparking doubts among netizens.
One netizen called 12345 to inquire about the municipal government, who replied that it was because of the Asian Games and they were taking care of the feelings of foreigners.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On September 18, the bus company in Hengshan County, Hunan Province also issued a suspension announcement.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
The third Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation will be held in Beijing on October 17, and the Chinese side will receive the advance delegation in Beijing on September 25.
However, it is somewhat nostalgic that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued a note requiring the advance delegations of various countries to undergo nucleic acid antigen testing in advance and provide photos of the test results, and they need to wear masks throughout the participation process.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
[A student from Xi'an Jiaotong University was scolded by the security guard for using the trash can in the dormitory for international students: This is for international students only, you don't know the rules at all! ]
On September 18, it was reported online that a student from the Xingqing campus of Xi'an Jiaotong University threw garbage into the trash can at the entrance of the dormitory for international students. The security guard said that it was for international students only and could not be thrown, and scolded the student for not knowing the rules.
The staff of the Xi'an Jiaotong University Office responded that they would contact the relevant person in charge to implement the handling.

On September 18, Nanning did not sound the air defense alarm due to the ASEAN Expo, which aroused citizens' doubts and protests, and was forced to make a temporary decision to sound the alarm at 5 pm.

content: On September 18, Apple responded that the employee was an American Indian female employee, and the official websites in the United States, Japan, South Korea and China all used this photo. Hu Xijin commented that the current Sino-US conflicts are deepening, and American companies should be cautious in using photos that are easy to cause misunderstandings.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: A student called the operator to ask why a base station was not built in Xi'an Information Vocational University, and the answer was: The principal believed that building a base station would destroy Feng Shui, and has not allowed operators to build base stations in the school.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On the evening of September 17, students at Xi'an Information Vocational University shouted in the building
It is reported that the school is still implementing strict control policies. The school is closed from Monday to Friday, and students cannot enter and leave the school at will; takeout is not allowed, the area around the school is sealed with iron sheets, and even bottled mineral water outside is not allowed to be bought.
The students were pushed to the limit by the school's various weird regulations, and then they were suddenly notified to gather at 6 o'clock the next morning to participate in the commemoration of the "918" incident, so they shouted in the building that night, and the whole dormitory building was scolding the principal.
At the same time, because the school does not allow the construction of signal base stations, students have been in a state of near-disconnection for a long time.
